collection:
This privacy policy applies to all
information collected through our web service.

Information We Collect
StackBlitz Buddy is a service that communicates with a Node.js service, hosted
on Heroku services, to temporarily host the prototyped webapps.

We collect the
information that is sent through HTTP endpoints by either people or OpenAI's
ChatGPT, for the sole purpose of providing the prototyping and programming
educational aim of StackBlitz Buddy.

Your
creations, including the HTML content and data sent via HTTP endpoints, are
hosted on our server and are accessible via a unique URL generated by our
service.
sharing:
Sharing Your
Information We do not share any information with third parties.
